name: Record Jump
description:
This is a short platformer game created for the 2017 Music Game Jam.

Jump on spinning and moving records and avoid falling off or touching the sharp obstacles.

You have three lives per level (it's shown in the top left corner of the screen during the game) and falling off the records into the sky or touching one of the obstacles will lose a life point.

controls:

WASD to move around

Space to jump

Escape to pause (records will still spin but the game is paused)

Enter to unpause
